item.title: CVE-2024-3206|2024-05-02T16:51:51.532Z -- recorp -- different%20menu%20in%20different%20pages%20%E2%80%93%20control%20menu%20visibility%20%28all%20in%20one%29
item.description: The Different Menu in Different Pages â€“ Control Menu Visibility (All in One) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the ajax() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.3.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to duplicate menus.
